language.entry: A Plaguewalker of the Abyss. The Scourge carries within himself a noxious plague, a gift from the eldritch creature Sho'Gorath, whom he can summon at a great price. He unleashes the plague upon his enemies or uses the Abyss to aid his companions.
Religious types and other eldritch deities do not like us.
I am not serving his eldritch deity.
A group only needs a single Plaguewalker.
Scourge is his name, plague is his game. Every offensive ability he performs poisons him. The plague can kill him if he isn't careful, he needs to give it to an enemy or cure it before it's too late.
The Eldritch Plaguewalker can at a cost bring great blessings of the Abyss unto the party. You may not know from looking at him, but he's a kind soul.
You may take my body, but my soul is embraced by the Abyss!
Let me take care of that for you.
I've seen wounds that were much worse.
Do not falter, Sho'Gorath will protect us,
As long as Sho'Gorath travels with us, we will be fine.
I will keep us safe, worry not.
Resist and fight. The Abyss watches over us tonight.
Worry not, for a Plaguewalker guides your path.
We fight to the very end, no matter what.
Ugh. I'll never get used to this.
The things I have to do to survive.
For all your sakes, I'm not sharing this.
Behold, a meal taken from the bowels of the Abyss!
It regenerates while being digested. It keeps you full for long.
It may look revolting but will sustain you for quite some time.
When blessed by the Abyss, no other disease can affect you.
I give to you all a part of me.
It is the will of Sho'Gorath!
All who serve the Dark shall fall!
We are blessed! How could you fail?!
The plague must endure. All else is meaningless.
Feel the might of the Plaguewalker!
What has no cure must be endured!
The Plague takes, the Plague gives.
Do you take me for a fool, Sho'Gorath?!
They are trying to split us up.
I've been denied for too long!
You are not worthy of my Plague!
I gave up everything... for this.
What would they say if they could see me?
In the end, I am alone...
Have you seen my pet squid?
I was sure Sho would be around here...
Show me pain, servants of the Dark!
I don't feel so well here.
This is where my path ends.
Let me suffer in your stead.
This should give you a chance.
I will make them fight me!
It's time for me to save us.
I go where the Plague needs to be.
I need more time to recover!
I cannot. I am too weak.
The Plague deserves a better Walker.
Can't you see I'm looking for my squid?
Sho? Where have you gone, boy?
I honor Sho'Gorath with my actions!
I'm sure I was supposed to do this.
I think Sho would approve of this.
I feel this is more or less good.
None may hide from the Dark...
Does the Abyss truly protect me?
Can you hear it? The whispers of the Dark...
The... thing... It is watching us.
I can feel its many eyes gazing upon us.
Watch yourself. Creatures of the Dark are always close.
Careful. They'll be upon us soon.
Fight. Maim. I MUST FEEL PAIN.
The wounds remind me of who I once was.
I shall kill them. And they shall kill me.
We have waited long enough, no?!
You wouldn't last a second in the Abyss.
Sho'Gorath has no patience for the lazy.
Continue like this and I alone shall remain.
None of you are worthy vessels of the Plague.
I've dedicated my entire life to this Plague...
Sho is such good company, if only he was here.
Ah, Sho... he quite hates that name, y'know?
I hope I can find Sho before we leave.
Make me bleed, sycophants of the Dark!
Put me out of my misery!
I shall meet them again in death...
Can you fellows help me find Sho?
My blade shall see if you serve the Dark!
Are you with them? Are you?
Let's see if the Plague strengthens you!
The Plaguewalker's path is defined by suffering.
We cannot leave now, they are waiting for us.
The Dark waits for a moment of weakness.
They are the vessel for my liberation! Do not take them from me!
No! Not until I find Sho!
Why would we leave these nice gentlemen alone?
The whispers, Sho'Gorath. They never end.
I can smell them, more are coming.
That's not how you communicate, my friend!
This is work of the Dark.
Prolong my sorrow! Prolong my pain!
You cannot escape me for long!
If this isn't frustrating, I do not know what is.
Well, what else should I expect?!
I'm telling you, we need to run.
Not even Sho'Gorath can save us!
We need to finish them swiftly!
The echoes of the Dark are ever louder.
Aren't you supposed to be good at this?
You fail Sho'Gorath and you fail me!
Do I have to do everything myself?
You're leaving all the work for me, I see?
I don't see the problem here.
Do not steal the blessing of pain!
Oh, you are such a disappointment.
The Dark encroaches on our every action.
This path leads only to ruin.
The Dark encroaches. We're not safe.
Pain. I need pain. Give me pain!
Just making sure you're still alive.
Wait. I don't know if you're ready.
Sho, in the way again? That's not nice!
I see what you are up to.
Sho wouldn't like that, I think.
You want to take my Plague!
If my wounds close i will kill you instead!
If Sho'Gorath wants me healthy, he'll say.
I'm not allowed to do that.
The Plague is all I require.
The Plague empowers me, not you.
I live by my strength alone!
Why would i want to kill them faster?
The Dark blinds you to true power.
Only Sho'Gorath can judge me, Darkspawn.
We need to get out of here.
We have to move away from here.
There is something in the shadows over there...
The Dark resonates within these walls.
I cannont control myself for LONG.
I must taste my own blood. Feel the tearings of my own flesh.
I am so tired right now.
So much sorrow in the air.
Can you just let it go Sho?
He won't give me a moment of peace.
Watch for ripples in the darkness.
If you want to help me, stab me as hard as you can!
You need a lot of training and some armor preferably.
What a pathetic excuse for adventurers.
Is there any wonder Sho'Gorath talks to me alone?
The path of the Plaguewalker leads only to the grave.
Why do I feel so plagued all of a sudden?
I'm trusting you on this food.
Food is only a diversion, i need pain and agony!
What good is food if you haven't slaughetered it yourself?
Food? I require pain! Not food!
This food reminds me of the life I had.
Every bite is a stern reminder of what I left behind.
What a nice, sunny day, right friends?.
Pretty good, I prefer squid though.

Does the Abyss truly protect me?
Can you hear it? The whispers of the Dark...
The... thing... It is watching us.
I can feel its many eyes gazing upon us.
Watch yourself. Creatures of the Dark are always close.
Careful. They'll be upon us soon.
Fight. Maim. I MUST FEEL PAIN.
The wounds remind me of who I once was.
I shall kill them. And they shall kill me.
We have waited long enough, no?!
You wouldn't last a second in the Abyss.
Sho'Gorath has no patience for the lazy.
Continue like this and I alone shall remain.
None of you are worthy vessels of the Plague.
I've dedicated my entire life to this Plague...
Sho is such good company, if only he was here.
Ah, Sho... he quite hates that name, y'know?
I hope I can find Sho before we leave.
Make me bleed, sycophants of the Dark!
Put me out of my misery!
I shall meet them again in death...
Can you fellows help me find Sho?
My blade shall see if you serve the Dark!
Are you with them? Are you?
Let's see if the Plague strengthens you!
The Plaguewalker's path is defined by suffering.
We cannot leave now, they are waiting for us.
The Dark waits for a moment of weakness.
They are the vessel for my liberation! Do not take them from me!
No! Not until I find Sho!
Why would we leave these nice gentlemen alone?
The whispers, Sho'Gorath. They never end.
I can smell them, more are coming.
That's not how you communicate, my friend!
This is work of the Dark.
Prolong my sorrow! Prolong my pain!
You cannot escape me for long!
If this isn't frustrating, I do not know what is.
Well, what else should I expect?!
I'm telling you, we need to run.
Not even Sho'Gorath can save us!
We need to finish them swiftly!
The echoes of the Dark are ever louder.
Aren't you supposed to be good at this?
You fail Sho'Gorath and you fail me!
Do I have to do everything myself?
You're leaving all the work for me, I see?
I don't see the problem here.
Do not steal the blessing of pain!
Oh, you are such a disappointment.
The Dark encroaches on our every action.
This path leads only to ruin.
The Dark encroaches. We're not safe.
Pain. I need pain. Give me pain!
Just making sure you're still alive.
Wait. I don't know if you're ready.
Sho, in the way again? That's not nice!
I see what you are up to.
Sho wouldn't like that, I think.
You want to take my Plague!
If my wounds close i will kill you instead!
If Sho'Gorath wants me healthy, he'll say.
I'm not allowed to do that.
The Plague is all I require.
The Plague empowers me, not you.
I live by my strength alone!
Why would i want to kill them faster?
The Dark blinds you to true power.
Only Sho'Gorath can judge me, Darkspawn.
We need to get out of here.
We have to move away from here.
There is something in the shadows over there...
The Dark resonates within these walls.
I cannont control myself for LONG.
I must taste my own blood. Feel the tearings of my own flesh.
I am so tired right now.
So much sorrow in the air.
Can you just let it go Sho?
He won't give me a moment of peace.
Watch for ripples in the darkness.
If you want to help me, stab me as hard as you can!
You need a lot of training and some armor preferably.
What a pathetic excuse for adventurers.
Is there any wonder Sho'Gorath talks to me alone?
The path of the Plaguewalker leads only to the grave.
Why do I feel so plagued all of a sudden?
I'm trusting you on this food.
Food is only a diversion, i need pain and agony!
What good is food if you haven't slaughetered it yourself?
Food? I require pain! Not food!
This food reminds me of the life I had.
Every bite is a stern reminder of what I left behind.
What a nice, sunny day, right friends?.
Pretty good, I prefer squid though.

A Plaguewalker of the Abyss. The Scourge carries within himself a noxious plague, a gift from the eldritch creature Sho'Gorath, whom he can summon at a great price. He unleashes the plague upon his enemies or uses the Abyss to aid his companions.
Religious types and other eldritch deities do not like us.
I am not serving his eldritch deity.
A group only needs a single Plaguewalker.
Scourge is his name, plague is his game. Every offensive ability he performs poisons him. The plague can kill him if he isn't careful, he needs to give it to an enemy or cure it before it's too late.
The Eldritch Plaguewalker can at a cost bring great blessings of the Abyss unto the party. You may not know from looking at him, but he's a kind soul.
You may take my body, but my soul is embraced by the Abyss!
Let me take care of that for you.
I've seen wounds that were much worse.
Do not falter, Sho'Gorath will protect us,
As long as Sho'Gorath travels with us, we will be fine.
I will keep us safe, worry not.
Resist and fight. The Abyss watches over us tonight.
Worry not, for a Plaguewalker guides your path.
We fight to the very end, no matter what.
Ugh. I'll never get used to this.
The things I have to do to survive.
For all your sakes, I'm not sharing this.
Behold, a meal taken from the bowels of the Abyss!
It regenerates while being digested. It keeps you full for long.
It may look revolting but will sustain you for quite some time.
When blessed by the Abyss, no other disease can affect you.
I give to you all a part of me.
It is the will of Sho'Gorath!
All who serve the Dark shall fall!
We are blessed! How could you fail?!
The plague must endure. All else is meaningless.
Feel the might of the Plaguewalker!
What has no cure must be endured!
The Plague takes, the Plague gives.
Do you take me for a fool, Sho'Gorath?!
They are trying to split us up.
I've been denied for too long!
You are not worthy of my Plague!
I gave up everything... for this.
What would they say if they could see me?
In the end, I am alone...
Have you seen my pet squid?
I was sure Sho would be around here...
Show me pain, servants of the Dark!
I don't feel so well here.
This is where my path ends.
Let me suffer in your stead.
This should give you a chance.
I will make them fight me!
It's time for me to save us.
I go where the Plague needs to be.
I need more time to recover!
I cannot. I am too weak.
The Plague deserves a better Walker.
Can't you see I'm looking for my squid?
Sho? Where have you gone, boy?
I honor Sho'Gorath with my actions!
I'm sure I was supposed to do this.
I think Sho would approve of this.
I feel this is more or less good.
